titleStmt.title: The grand question, concerning the Bishops right to vote in Parliament in cases capital stated and argued, from the Parliament-rolls, and the history of former times : with an enquiry into their peerage, and the three estates in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for M.P., and sold by Richard Rumball ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
